text: Aur inn mein baaz (aisay bhi hain kay) teri taraf kaan lagatay hain yahan tak kay jabb teray pass say jatay hain to ehl-e-ilm say (ba-waja kund zehni-o-laperwahee kay) poochtay hain kay iss ney abhi kiya kaha tha? Yehi log hain jinn kay dilon per Allah ney mohar ker di hai aur woh apni khuawishon ki perwi kertay hain
